thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Randeep Sidhu

author: Randeep Sidhu
title: Randeep Sidhu
text: FlightHub worst website to book Airline tickets on ...NO after sales services....Never going to book any of my flights here and will not recommend it to anyoneðŸ˜¡...Had to call almost 15 times in 4 days to reschedule flight because flights are available but their system won't work, when system works call drops while I am on hold( even though they ask for a call back no. they never call back so you talk to a new agent every time)....After all this I am told to either call 10 days prier to when I wish to fly and they will see if they can reschedule my return flight OR pay for a new return ticket. I am told by agents that tickets are available but sustem won't allow rescheduling( How is that my fault)ðŸ˜¡ Worst After Sales Services ðŸ˜¡
